name: BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode One
name_original: BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode One
description:
BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode One is an action-shooter game developed by Irrational Games. It came out on 12-11-2013. 2K Games published the game. BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode One has a Metascore of 71, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode One is available on PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, PC and PlayStation 3. You can purchase the game on Steam.
